metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4199 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: vm-support 0.88 in VMware Tools, as distributed with VMware Workstation through 10.0.3 and other products, allows local users to write to arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a file in /tmp.

criterions.comment: open-vm-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
